Sentencas: In this work, adding a NiTiO3 (NTO) reforming layer is firstly adopted as a low cost method to improve the carbon tolerance in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Carbon-tolerant solid oxide fuel cells using NiTiO3 as an anode internal reforming layer

Sentencas: XRD patterns suggest that NTO has a good chemical compatibility with the YSZ electrolyte, and NTO can be totally reduced to Ni and
Titulo: Carbon-tolerant solid oxide fuel cells using NiTiO3 as an anode internal reforming layer

Sentencas: TiO2 when exposing to the H-2 atmosphere.
Titulo: Carbon-tolerant solid oxide fuel cells using NiTiO3 as an anode internal reforming layer

Sentencas: Maximum power densities for the cells with the NTO layers at 700 degrees C are 270 mWcm(-2) with wet H-2 fuel, and 236 mWcm(-2) with wet methane fuel, respectively.
Titulo: Carbon-tolerant solid oxide fuel cells using NiTiO3 as an anode internal reforming layer

Sentencas: Improved discharging stability for the cells with NTO layers has also been observed.
Titulo: Carbon-tolerant solid oxide fuel cells using NiTiO3 as an anode internal reforming layer

Sentencas: The current density remains unchanged for the cells with NTO layers during a 26 h test, while it drops to zero within 1 h for the cells without NTO.
Titulo: Carbon-tolerant solid oxide fuel cells using NiTiO3 as an anode internal reforming layer

Sentencas: Above electro-performance and long term stability tests suggest that fabricating a NTO reforming layer on the anode surface is an efficient and inexpensive method to realize highly carbon tolerant SOFCs.
Titulo: Carbon-tolerant solid oxide fuel cells using NiTiO3 as an anode internal reforming layer
